Source code for maxaibase.model.spark.spark_regressor

from maxaibase.model.spark.spark_base import SparkBaseModel
from maxairesources.logging.logger import get_logger
from abc import ABC, abstractmethod

from pyspark.ml.evaluation import RegressionEvaluator
from pyspark.ml.tuning import CrossValidator, ParamGridBuilder

from maxaimetadata.maxflow import MaxFlow

logger = get_logger(__name__)



[docs]class SparkRegressorBaseModel(SparkBaseModel):
    """used for running a regression model

    Args:
        model: model 
        param_grid: grid of parameters
        params: params for the model
        target_col: target column of the data
        data: data on which the model will run
        run: Maxflow run 
    """
    def __init__(self):
        self.model = None
        self.param_grid = None
        self.params = None
        self.target_col = None
        self.data = None
        self.run = None
        try:
            self.run = MaxFlow.get_active_flow().get_active_run()
        except:
            pass


[docs]    @abstractmethod
    def build(self):
        raise NotImplementedError()


    def __get_param_builder(self):
        """generates ParamGridBuilder object

        Returns:
            param_grid: ParamGridBuilder object
        """
        param_grid = ParamGridBuilder()
        for key, value in self.param_grid.items():
            param_grid = param_grid.addGrid(eval("self.model." + key), value)
        return param_grid.build()

    def __optimise_model(self):
        """
        optimise the model on different parameters
        """
        evaluator = RegressionEvaluator(labelCol=self.target_col)
        param_grid_builder = self.__get_param_builder()
        cross_validator = CrossValidator(
            estimator=self.model,
            estimatorParamMaps=param_grid_builder,
            parallelism=2,
            evaluator=evaluator,
            numFolds=3,
        )
        self.model = cross_validator.fit(self.data).bestModel
        
        if self.run:
            if ((self.param_grid != "") and (bool(self.param_grid)) and (self.param_grid is not None)):
                self.run.log_params({'param_grid': self.param_grid})
                logger.info('Model {} optimized successfully on param grid'.format(self.model.__class__.__name__),
                            extra={'param_grid': self.param_grid})
            self.run.log_params(self.best_params())
            logger.info('Model {} trained successfully on best parameters'.format(self.model.__class__.__name__),
                        extra=self.best_params())
                    
        if self.run:
            self.run.log_model(self)



[docs]    def fit(self, data):
        """fits the model on the data

        Args:
            data (spark dataframe): data on which the model needs to be fit
        """
        self.data = data
        self.__optimise_model()



[docs]    def predict(self, data):
        """predicts target column 

        Args:
            data (spark dataframe): data on which prediction needs to be made

        Raises:
            Exception: "load model before calling predict"

        Returns:
            data(spark dataframe): data with predicted target column
        """
        # Making predictions
        if not self.model:
            raise Exception("load model before calling predict")
        data = self.model.transform(data)
        return data



[docs]    def get_model_diagnostics(self):
        """spark regression metrics"""
        pass



[docs]    def get_params(self):
        """get the parameters 

        Returns:
            params: parameters
            param_grid: dictionary of parameters 
        """
        return {'params': self.params, 'param_grid': self.param_grid}
